# cho-backdrop



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                                                | Type      | Default |
| --------- | --------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `visible` | `visible` | If `true`, the backdrop and it's children will be visible. | `boolean` | `false` |


## Slots

| Slot | Description                       |
| ---- | --------------------------------- |
|      | The main content of the backdrop. |
